data.title: Section 1's title
data.text: THE BIG BRAIN AM WINNING AGAIN! I AM THE GREETEST! NOW I AM LEAVING EARTH, FOR NO RAISEN! I daresay that Fry has discovered the smelliest object in the known universe! Or a guy who burns down a bar for the insurance money! Now that the, uh, garbage ball is in space, Doctor, perhaps you can help me with my sexual inhibitions? But I know you in the future. I cleaned your poop. You know the worst thing about being a slave? They make you work, but they don't pay you or let you go.
